dmca_clarifications: I would like to provide some additional information.  
The above app utilizes 5 convenience buttons that redirect to links on the  
official WWE website. To ensure that these buttons are not confused with  
in-app content, we force the launch of an internet browser window which  
navigates the user to a link that is appropriate for the buttons label. The  
customer is automatically transferred to the particular genuine web page of  
the original author. There is no deception in what is happening. I thought  
this was allowed, and legal. In the description on the market we clearly  
state that we are not affiliated. If the name of the app, market  
description, or content is in violation, I will gladly remove it. We use  
only public domain, gnu license, or creative commons images within our  
application. I do not want to profit from someone else's hard work. I have  
spent many hours on this app and have a lot invested in it. It has produced  
a handful of downloads, compared to the effort involved in bringing all  
this functionality to the users. Not everyone who uses these phones are  
technically savvy. Surely my customers would have paid someone $1.49 to set  
up all these links, connect all the news feeds, and provide some nice  
wallpapers about this common interest. I have many updates coming for these  
users, like chatting, new sharper looking user interface, additional  
widgets, and so on. If I am indeed in violation, I would like the  
opportunity to remove any such issues, and I can continue to add content  
for my customers that is not in violation of any laws. I cannot be clear  
enough, I do not want to break any laws. I just want to provide users an  
easier way to get to the things they care about. This app includes an air  
horn for celebrating their love as a fan by making loud noises. I am just  
providing a service of convenience that my fans love.

Of the few downloads, I had 7 ratings, all 5 stars.
========================
by Dana (March 12, 2011)
Great!

by Ant (December 3, 2010)
Love it! Excellent app! Definitely worth the price.
========================

I hope I can get this all worked out. Thank you for your help with this.
